Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans opened the scoring after 73 seconds.
Kevin De Bruyne scored Belgium's second goal after 80 minutes.
Romelu Lukaku had a third overturned goal of the tournament decided by the tip of a knee.
Domenico Tedesco made four changes to the lineup, including restoring Jan Vertonghen to defense and adding Youri Tielemans alongside Amadou Onana in midfield.
Kevin De Bruyne's slide rule pass sent Lukaku clear to finish calmly into the bottom corner, only for VAR to intervene.
Post-Match Reflections: Domenico Tedesco expressed relief at winning the game and emphasized the importance of getting three points.
Tedesco showed frustration at the team's inability to kill the game earlier despite having 20 shots and nine on target.
Tedesco mentioned that the mentality of the team was good during the match.
